channel.title: plant defense signaling on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in plant defense signaling on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaLOX2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana03g000103 Gene Symbol: CaLOX2 Gene Name: lipoxygenase 2 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Involvement of sweet pepper CaLOX2 in jasmonate-dependent induced defence against Western flower thrips.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsRab11A Gene Name: Rab GTPase 11 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cucumber (Cucumis sativus L.

item.title: CsTCTP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsTCTP2 Gene Name: translationally controlled tumor protein 2S Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cucumber (Cucumis sativus L.

item.title: FvLOX3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_6g34960 Gene Symbol: FvLOX3 Gene Name: lipoxygenase 3 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: FvMPK6 phosphorylates FvJAZ12 at the amino acid residues S179 and T183 adjacent to the PY residues, thereby attenuating its nuclear accumulation and relieving its repression for FvMYC2, which acts to control the expression of lipoxygenase 3 (FvLOX3), an important gene involved in JA biosynthesis and a diverse array of cellular metabolisms.

item.title: GaJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cotton_A_11862 Gene Symbol: GaJAZ1 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum L.

item.title: GbWRKY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GbWRKY1 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Our data suggest that GbWRKY1 is a critical regulator mediating the plant defense-to-development transition during V.

item.title: GhSAMDC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSAMDC Gene Name: S-adenosylmethionine decarboxylase Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton S-adenosylmethionine decarboxylase(GhSAMDC)-mediated spermine biosynthesis is required for salicylic acid- and leucine-correlated signaling in the defense response to Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GhSPMS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSPMS Gene Name: Spm synthase Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton S-adenosylmethionine decarboxylase(GhSAMDC)-mediated spermine biosynthesis is required for salicylic acid- and leucine-correlated signaling in the defense response to Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GhTINY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GhD06G0642 Gene Symbol: GhTINY2 Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Functional Genomics Database Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Orchestration of plant development and defense by indirect crosstalk of salicylic acid and brassinosteorid signaling via transcription factor GhTINY2.

item.title: GmEDS1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.04g177700 Gene Symbol: GmEDS1a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Silencing of GmEDS1a/b and GmPAD4 stopped accumulation of salicylic acid and increased the plant’s suceptibility to Pseudomonas syringae pv glycinea and soybean mosaic virus infection.

item.title: GmEDS1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.06g187400 Gene Symbol: GmEDS1b Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Silencing of GmEDS1a/b and GmPAD4 stopped accumulation of salicylic acid and increased the plant’s suceptibility to Pseudomonas syringae pv glycinea and soybean mosaic virus infection.

item.title: GmPAD4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g002100 Gene Symbol: GmPAD4 Gene Name: PHYTOALEXIN DEFICIENT 4 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Silencing of GmEDS1a/b and GmPAD4 stopped accumulation of salicylic acid and increased the plant’s suceptibility to Pseudomonas syringae pv glycinea and soybean mosaic virus infection.

item.title: LeEix2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeEix2 Gene Name: receptor-like protein EIX2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Endosomal signaling of the tomato leucine-rich repeat receptor-like protein LeEix2.

item.title: LrABCF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LrABCF1 Gene Name: ATP-binding cassette transporter1 Genome: Species: Lilium regale Functional Descriptions: LrABCF1, a GCN-type ATP-binding cassette transporter from Lilium regale, is involved in defense responses against viral and fungal pathogens.

item.title: Sl-RGS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc05g014160 Gene Symbol: Sl-RGS1 Gene Name: G protein signaling 1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: RGS1 negatively regulates disease resistance and is required for glucose-enhanced defense under low light.

item.title: SlWRKY75
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc05g015850 Gene Symbol: SlWRKY75 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor75 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Here, we characterized tomato (Solanum lycopersicum) SlWRKY75, which promotes defenses against P.

item.title: TaADF4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaADF4 Gene Name: actin-depolymerizing factor 4 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaADF4, an actin-depolymerizing factor from wheat, is required for resistance to the stripe rust pathogen Puccinia striiformis f.
